data.eml:eml: An updated key to the species of Fannia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera: Fanniidae) of Southern South America, and the description of a new species from Mendoza, Argentina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Domínguez, M. Cecilia, Aballay, Fernando H. (2014): An updated key to the species of Fannia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera: Fanniidae) of Southern South America, and the description of a new species from Mendoza, Argentina. Zootaxa 3795 (2): 152-160, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.2.4
